article:
'Motion' is the annual conference on animation, motion graphics and visual
effects. The first motion conference was held in 2006, as a regional event
taking place in the Southwest part of the United States. The event is now
worldwide, and is attended by 2D animators, 3D animators, motion picture title
designers, visual effects artists, game animators, motion graphic artists and
broadcast designers. Motion is held in Albuquerque, New Mexico each year,
starting on the last Sunday of the Albuquerque International Balloon Fiesta.
